browser.title: Enable Browser
browser.description: Enable the logging of browser name and version in the body as class.

resolution.title: Enable Resolution
resolution.description: Enable the logging of the height and width of the device in the body as class.

platform.title: Enable Platform
platform.description: Enable the logging of the platform; eg Windows in the body as class.

language.title: Enable language
language.description: Enable the logging of the selected language chosen by the user in the browser to the body class.

country.title: Enable country
country.description: Enable the logging of the country the user is located in to the body class.

referrer.title: Enable referrer
referrer.description: Enable the logging of the website referrer if there is any to the body class.
